org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowChoreographer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowChoreographer

  • @Implements(value=android.view.Choreographer.class)
public class ShadowChoreographer
extends Object
    Shadow for Choreographer.

    This class maintains its own concept of the current time aimed at making animations work correctly. Time starts out at 0 and advances by "frameInterval" every time Choreographer.getFrameTimeNanos() is called.
